lrc.lyric:
[by:我想成疯子]
[ti:Emily]
[ar:San Fermin]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:01.96]It's never enough in the moment
[00:04.26]No matter who I go home with
[00:06.68]Late nights awake and I'm lonely
[00:09.04]Myself again, and it's lonely
[00:11.68]I'm good, I'm good, it's a good time
[00:14.30]Keeping all my colors in a straight line
[00:16.63]Can't believe it all comes to nothing
[00:21.34]Emily, let the night take me
[00:23.64]Down down down the rabbithole
[00:26.24]Dug in deep with my unbelief
[00:28.45]And I'm running on empty
[00:31.16]Three four five on the steps we arrive
[00:33.64]Down down down the rabbithole
[00:36.26]Gotta get out of my head tonight
[00:38.66]Let's forget about it, oh
[00:43.82]Leave it all alone tonight
[00:47.94]And we're waiting on a moment when it feels right
[00:50.96]Don't want to talk about it, oh no
[00:54.37]I got everything I need
[00:59.19]Don't leave me lonely
[01:09.15]Don't leave me lonely baby
[01:21.56]Here in my blurry condition
[01:23.73]I hide myself in the room and
[01:26.04]Just tell them all that it's nothing
[01:28.81]Alone with all of these humans
[01:31.11]It'll be believing in the midnight
[01:33.72]Young unbeliever in the dim light
[01:36.21]Can't believe it all comes to nothing
[01:41.39]Emily, let the night take me
[01:43.74]Down down down the rabbithole
[01:46.35]Dug in deep with my unbelief
[01:48.60]And I'm running on empty
[01:51.35]Three four five on the steps we arrive
[01:53.81]Down down down the rabbithole
[01:56.32]Gotta get out of my head tonight
[02:00.71]Let's forget about it, oh
[02:03.91]Leave it all alone tonight
[02:07.78]And we're waiting on a moment when it feels right
[02:10.58]Don't want to talk about it, oh no
[02:14.34]I got everything I need
[02:19.15]Don't leave me lonely
[02:29.01]Don't leave me lonely baby
[02:41.11]Emily, let the night take me
[02:43.38]Down down down the rabbithole
[02:45.83]Dug in deep with my unbelief
[02:50.24]Let's forget about it, oh
[02:54.17]Leave it all alone tonight
[02:56.82]And we're waiting on a moment when it feels right
[03:00.40]Don't want to talk about it, oh no
[03:04.12]I got everything I need
[03:09.41]Don't leave me lonely

[03:14.04](down down down the rabbithole)

tlyric.lyric:
[by:AnSenn]
[00:01.96]此时此刻，我永远不能够满足
[00:04.26]无论谁与我一起归家
[00:06.68]半夜时分，独自醒来
[00:09.04]再次再次，孤独寂寞
[00:11.68]我很好，我没事，一切正常
[00:14.30]尝试着使一切按部就班
[00:16.63]我无法相信，一切就这么消失了
[00:21.34]艾米莉，让深夜带我
[00:23.64]进入那无尽的思索之中
[00:26.24]带着疑惑，步步深入
[00:28.45]尽管我已筋疲力尽
[00:31.16]一步两步，逐渐深入
[00:33.64]进入那无尽的思索之中
[00:36.26]今晚我就要忘掉这一切
[00:38.66]抛诸一切于脑后吧
[00:43.82]今晚把全部都放在一边
[00:47.94]我们只是亟待一个正确的时机
[00:50.96]请不要讨论到它了
[00:54.37]我得到了我要的一切
[00:59.19]不要丢下我一个人
[01:09.15]勿徒留我孤身一人
[01:21.56]如今我如同雾里看花
[01:23.73]躲在自己的房间中
[01:26.04]跟他们说着一切正常
[01:28.81]让他们都一边去吧
[01:31.11]午夜让人们的精神有所寄托
[01:33.72]可昏暗中他们如同行尸走肉
[01:36.21]无法相信，一切竟归于虚无
[01:41.39]艾米莉，让深夜带我
[01:43.74]进入那无尽的思索之中
[01:46.35]带着疑惑，步步深入
[01:48.60]尽管我已筋疲力尽
[01:51.35]一步两步，逐渐深入
[01:53.81]进入那无尽的思索之中
[01:56.32]今晚我就要忘掉这一切
[02:00.71]抛诸一切于脑后吧
[02:03.91]今晚不要再想了
[02:07.78]我们只是在等待一个更妥当的时机
[02:10.58]不想再谈论到它了
[02:14.34]我得到了我要的一切
[02:19.15]不要丢下我一个人
[02:29.01]勿徒留我孤身一人
[02:41.11]艾米莉，让夜幕带我
[02:43.38]进入那无尽的思索之中
[02:45.83]带着疑惑，步步深入
[02:50.24]抛诸一切于脑后吧
[02:54.17]今晚不要再想了
[02:56.82]我们只是亟待一个准确的时机
[03:00.40]不想再谈论到它了
[03:04.12]我得到了我要的一切
[03:09.41]勿徒留我孤身一人
[03:12.07]今晚我就要忘掉这一切
[03:14.04]（进入那无尽的思索之中）

[03:18.86]（不要丢下我一个人）
[03:21.54]今晚我就要忘掉这一切
[03:23.84]（进入那无尽的思索之中）
